settings.heading: SKILLED, CARING PROFESSIONALS
settings.title: Why Become a Monthly Member?
settings.body:
We offer an amazing membership to our loyal clients, so you can get the biggest bang for your buck! We’d love to have you as part of the BAM fam!

Our members enjoy member-only access to monthly promotions with unbeatable rates! Plus you receive 10% off all of our products, complimentary B-12 shots, a complimentary monthly BAM Signature Facial, a sexual optimization regimen, and member pricing (30-40% average discount) on all á là carte Aesthetic and Wellness services and packages!

settings.description: A video about our membership details.

settings.label: START YOUR HEALTH AND WELLNESS JOURNEY

settings.text:
Our members enjoy member-only access to monthly promotions with exclusive pricing and perks.
Check out the membership options to see which one is right for you.

Not sure which one you need? Call or book your complimentary Total Aesthetic consultation
with our experts to review your goals and wishes, and receive a tailored, comprehensive treatment plan including the timeframe, the aesthetic services, the products and the wellness services you will need to help you achieve your goals.

settings.question: Defined Membership $99
settings.answer:
Choose from: ($125 value)

/ BAM Signature Express Facial
/ Dermaplaning Facial

PLUS:

/ Average of 20-35% off additional services -see member pricing sheet
/ Botox and Xeomin $11 per unit (20+ units)
/ 10% off Filler 10% off retail and medical grade skincare
/ Weekly wellness B12 shot

settings.question: Polished Membesrship $179
settings.answer:
Choose monthly: ($250 value)
/ Microneedling Facial
/ BAM Deluxe Facial with Peel
/ Red Carpet Facial/Peel
/ Signature HydraFacial® ($175 value)

PLUS:

/ Average of 20-35% off services
/ Botox and Xeomin $10 per unit (20+ units)
/ 12% off Filler
/ 15% off retail and medical grade skincare
/ Weekly wellness B12 shot

*can select any facial service from Defined Tier as well

settings.question: Refined Membership $249
settings.answer:
Choose one each month: ($250 value)
/ Microneedling Facial
/ BAM Deluxe Facial with Peel
/ HydraFacial® Deluxe
/ AlphaRet Advanced Peel
/ IPL Brightening PhotoFacial
/ Laser Genesis Skin Smoothing Facial

PLUS:
/ Average of 20-35% off additional services
/ Botox and Xeomin $9 per unit (20+ units
/ 15% off Filler
/ 15% off retail and medical grade skincare
/ Weekly wellness B12 shot

*can select any facial service from Defined and Polished Tiers as well

settings.text: We are thrilled to have you as a BAM member! Our top priority at Balanced Aesthetics is…Your health fromthe inside out! Please review and sign the below acknowledgement of understanding.

settings.heading: Sign up to become a BAMFAM Member
settings.message: To join our BAMFAM Membership, please fill out this form and we will contact your for payment.

settings.heading: SKILLED, CARING PROFESSIONALS
settings.title: BAMFAM Membership
settings.body: For only $100 per month, start your membership today and begin enjoying all of the benefits of becoming part of the BAMFAM! Receive monthly, complimentary BAM Signature Facial treatments, discounts on retail products, and more.

settings.heading: Contact Us
settings.message: Call us at (470) 226-2390 for a free consultation with our team.
